name: Midnight (itch) (UF Digital Worlds Institute)
description:
Midnight

Created by Heidy Charbonier

We've all been there - a beloved pet passes away suddenly and we turn to the Dark Arts in order to resurrect them. But this time something goes wrong,  you are reunited with your kitty 'Midnight', but both of you are now in the spirit realm. What can be done to get you both back to the world of the living?

Outstanding and beautiful original artwork makes this adventure platformer a real journey into another world. Have your finger on the 'P' key to blast your flashlight at the shadow monsters though, or you might die again, after dying, so like death inception.
